Homeland Security Secretary Mayorkas dismisses Republican calls to resign over the border

STORY POSTED 3 HOURS AGO

ABC News (WASHINGTON) - Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas on Sunday rebuffed calls from leading Republicans to step aside - or risk impeachment - and underscored the critical nature of managing migration challenges "gripping" the Western Hemisphere. In an interview...

0.title: Homeland Security Secretary Mayorkas dismisses Republican calls to resign over the border
0.summary: Alejandro Mayorkas, the Secretary of Homeland Security, has dismissed calls from leading Republicans to resign over the conditions at the US-Mexico border. He highlighted that managing migration challenges is a critical task in order to address problems gripping Western Hemisphere.

Blackhawks News: This was actually Chicago's best player on Friday

08-01-2023 4:01 PM

The Chicago Blackhawks earned a big win over the Arizona Coyotes at the United Center on Friday night. That isn't great for the Connor Bedard sweepstakes but most of the teams around them in that also earned a couple of points this weekend so it is no big deal. Jake McCabe and Tyler...

1.title: Blackhawks News: This was actually Chicago's best player on Friday
1.summary: The Chicago Blackhawks won their match against the Arizona Coyotes on Friday night, with Jake McCabe and Tyler Motte being the team's best players. Despite some other teams around them earning a couple of points this weekend, it was no big deal for the Connor Bedard Sweepstakes.
